Symbol.Script_2D:
if lod2D = 0 then end
! Wall Contour Line WALL_CONTOUR_OFF = 1 WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE = 2 WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE = 3 WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES = 4
if (abs(SYMB_ROTANGLE)<EPS and SYMB_MIRRORED) or (abs(SYMB_ROTANGLE-180)<EPS and not(SYMB_MIRRORED)) then jamb1=WIDO_RIGHT_JAMB jamb2=WIDO_LEFT_JAMB else jamb2=WIDO_RIGHT_JAMB jamb1=WIDO_LEFT_JAMB endif
pen gs_pen_2D
a0=a a_original=a
if symm then bf1=a * (nWindows / (nWindows + 1))
!********************************** !************************** Fenster
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE then goto 1100 if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_TWO | lod2D = DET2D_FS_MIDDLE then goto 1050 if lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED then goto 1020
!********************* scale 1:500
1500:
end
!********************* scale 1:200<
1200:
end
!********************* scale 1:200
1100:
gosub 2000
end
!********************* scale 1:100
1050:
gosub 2000
end
!********************* scale 1:20/50
1020:
gosub 2000
end
2000:
!********************************** wall edge lines !**************************************************
if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then add2 0, -gs_frame_thk mul2 1, -1 endif
pen gs_pen_brust
if dars_2d=0 then feba_i=0 feba_i2=0 endif
!*********** outside ********* !*****************************
!*** line under window
line_type gs_wcont_line_out
if gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if gs_feba_a then line2 -a/2+jamb1+thkSkinAtSillLeft, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL
if gs_fbl<WIDO_SILL then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0 endif endif
!*** line under door
line_type gs_wcont_line_out_d
if gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if feba_a2=1 then line2 a/2-jamb2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL endif
!*********** inside ********** !*****************************
!*** line under window
line_type gs_wcont_line_in
if gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE or gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if feba_i=1 then line2 -a/2+thkSkinAtBoardLeft, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp endif endif
if gs_siv<WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL-gs_frame_thk then\ line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-gs_siv
!*** line under door
line_type gs_wcont_line_in_d
if gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE or gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if feba_i2=1 then line2 a/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS endif
!************** lines of wall edges when no window board/sill
!***** line between window and door
line_type gs_wcont_line_out
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE then
if dars_2D=0 and GLOB_ELEVATION>0.001 then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp endif
else
line_type gs_wcont_line_out
if gs_feba_a+feba_a2=0 then if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_DETAILED or bMainFieldFix or not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) then if gs_opening_dir_m = 2 and not(bMainFieldFix) then if WIDO_SILL> gs_frame_thk-gs_vt then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_sash_thk-gs_vt else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0 endif else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_sash_thk-gs_vt endif endif
line_type gs_wcont_line_in
if feba_i+feba_i2=0 then
if dars_2D=0 and GLOB_ELEVATION>0.001 then if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_DETAILED or bMainFieldFix or WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_vt-gs_sash_thk endif else if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_DETAILED or bMainFieldFix or WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE or gs_opening_dir_m = 2 then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_vt-gs_sash_thk endif endif endif
endif
!**************************** outside
!*** line at window side
line_type gs_wcont_line_out
if gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if not(gs_feba_a) then if gs_opening_dir_m = 2 and not(bMainFieldFix) then if WIDO_SILL> gs_frame_thk-gs_vt then line2 -a/2+jamb1, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL endif else line2 -a/2+jamb1, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL endif endif endif
!*** line at door side
line_type gs_wcont_line_out_d
if gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if feba_a2=0 then line2 a/2-jamb2, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+bf1-stb_m, WIDO_SILL endif
!***************************** inside
!*** line at window side
line_type gs_wcont_line_in
if gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | gs_wcont_line_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if feba_i=0 then line2 -a/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS+tiefe_hkorp endif endif
!*** line at door side
line_type gs_wcont_line_in_d
if gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | gs_wcont_line_d_m = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then if feba_i2=0 then line2 a/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, -a/2+bf1-stb_m, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS endif
line_type SYMB_LINETYPE pen gs_pen_2D
if lod2D > DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE then
!**************************** 1:50, 1:20
fill gs_wallhole_fill
!************************* outside sills
if gs_feba_a then if gs_fbl > eps then fill gs_wallhole_fill put -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl, 0, -a/2+jamb1-suba_l, gs_fbl, 0, -a/2+jamb1-suba_l, WIDO_SILL, 0, -a/2+jamb1+thkSkinAtSillLeft, WIDO_SILL, 0, -a/2+jamb1+thkSkinAtSillLeft, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 5 then poly2_b nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, get(nsp) else wallhole2 nsp/3,1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, 0, 0, 0, get(nsp) endif endif
pen penSkinAtSill line_type ltSkinAtSill line_property 2 wallline2 -a/2+jamb1-suba_l, WIDO_SILL, -a/2+jamb1, WIDO_SILL
pen gs_pen_2D line_type 1 line_property 0
line2 -a/2+jamb1-suba_l, gs_fbl, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl line2 -a/2+jamb1-suba_l, gs_fbl, -a/2+jamb1-suba_l, WIDO_SILL if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_DETAILED or bMainFieldFix or WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0 else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_vt endif endif if (not(gs_feba_a) | not(gs_fbl > EPS)) & WIDO_SILL > EPS then fill 0 wallhole2 4,2 + 64, 0, -1, 0,0,0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL+0.1, 0, -a/2+jamb1+thkSkinAtSillLeft, WIDO_SILL+0.1, 0, -a/2+jamb1+thkSkinAtSillLeft, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0 endif
if feba_a2=1 then fill gs_wallhole_fill put -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl, 0, a/2-jamb2+suba_r, gs_fbl, 0, a/2-jamb2+suba_r, WIDO_SILL, 0, a/2-jamb2-thkSkinAtSillLeft, WIDO_SILL, 0, a/2-jamb2-thkSkinAtSillLeft, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0
if gs_fbl > eps then if GLOB_CONTEXT = 5 then poly2_b nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, get(nsp) else wallhole2 nsp/3,1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, 0,0,0, get(nsp) endif endif
pen penSkinAtSill line_type ltSkinAtSill line_property 2 wallline2 a/2-jamb2+suba_r, WIDO_SILL, a/2-jamb2, WIDO_SILL
pen gs_pen_2D line_type 1 line_property 0
line2 a/2-jamb2+suba_r, gs_fbl, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl line2 a/2-jamb2+suba_r, gs_fbl, a/2-jamb2+suba_r, WIDO_SILL if not(gs_feba_a) then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, gs_fbl, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0 endif endif if not(feba_a2) & WIDO_SILL > EPS then fill 0 wallhole2 4,2 + 64, 0, -1, 0,0,0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL+0.1, 0, a/2-jamb2-thkSkinAtSillLeft, WIDO_SILL+0.1, 0, a/2-jamb2-thkSkinAtSillLeft, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0 endif
!************************* inside boards
if feba_i+dars_2D=2 then if abs (-gs_frame_thk-siv) > eps then fill gs_wallhole_fill put -a/2-gs_subi_l, -gs_frame_thk-siv, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0, -a/2+thkSkinAtBoardLeft, 0, 0, -a/2+thkSkinAtBoardLeft, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS, 0, -a/2-gs_subi_l, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS, 0
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 5 then poly2_b nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, get(nsp) else wallhole2 nsp/3,1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, 0,0,0, get(nsp) endif endif
pen penSkinAtBoard line_type ltSkinAtBoard line_property 2 wallline2 -a/2, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS, -a/2-gs_subi_l, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS
pen gs_pen_2D line_type 1 line_property 0
line2 -a/2-gs_subi_l, -gs_frame_thk-siv, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv line2 -a/2-gs_subi_l, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, -a/2-gs_subi_l, -gs_frame_thk-siv
if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_DETAILED or bMainFieldFix or not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_vt-gs_sash_thk, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv endif endif if feba_i+dars_2D <> 2 | not(abs(-gs_frame_thk-siv) > EPS) & (WALL_THICKNESS - WIDO_SILL) > EPS then fill 0 wallhole2 4,2 + 64, 0, -1, 0,0,0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS-0.1, 0, -a/2+thkSkinAtBoardLeft, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS-0.1, 0, -a/2+thkSkinAtBoardLeft, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0 endif
if feba_i2+dars_2D=2 then if abs (-gs_frame_thk-siv) > eps then fill gs_wallhole_fill put -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv, 0, a/2+gs_subi_r, -gs_frame_thk-siv, 0, a/2+gs_subi_r, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, 0, a/2-thkSkinAtBoardRight, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, 0, a/2-thkSkinAtBoardRight, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 5 then poly2_b nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, get(nsp) else wallhole2 nsp/3,1+2+4+64, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, 0,0,0, get(nsp) endif endif pen penSkinAtBoard line_type ltSkinAtBoard line_property 2 wallline2 a/2, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS, a/2+gs_subi_r, WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS
pen gs_pen_2D line_type 1 line_property 0
line2 a/2+gs_subi_r, -gs_frame_thk-siv, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv line2 a/2+gs_subi_r, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS, a/2+gs_subi_r, -gs_frame_thk-siv
if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_DETAILED or bMainFieldFix or WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv else line2 -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_vt-gs_sash_thk, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, -gs_frame_thk-siv endif endif if (feba_i2+dars_2D <> 2 | not(abs(-gs_frame_thk-siv) > EPS)) & (WALL_THICKNESS - WIDO_SILL) > EPS then fill 0 wallhole2 4,2 + 64, 0, -1, 0,0,0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS-0.1, 0, a/2-thkSkinAtBoardRight, WIDO_SILL-WALL_THICKNESS-0.1, 0, a/2-thkSkinAtBoardRight, 0, 0, -a/2+bf1-stb_m/2, 0, 0 endif
endif
if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then del 2 endif
return
end
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iSillType SILL_SOLID = 1 SILL_METAL = 2
EPS=0.00001
! lod2d DET2D_FS_OFF = 0 DET2D_FS_SCALESENS = -1 DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE = 11 DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_TWO = 12 DET2D_FS_MIDDLE = 21 DET2D_FS_MIDDLE_USA = 22 DET2D_FS_DETAILED = 30 DET2D_FS_DETAILED_FIX_GRID = 31 DET2D_FS_DETAILED_USA = 32 DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI = 51 DET2D_FS_DETAILED_CHI = 52
!***************** for tolerance ************
gs_tolerance = 0
if not(gs_stockb) then ! equal profiles
gs_frame_width = gs_frame_width + gs_tolerance
else
gs_stb_r = gs_stb_r + gs_tolerance gs_stb_l = gs_stb_l + gs_tolerance gs_stb_ob = gs_stb_ob + gs_tolerance gs_stb_u = gs_stb_u + gs_tolerance
endif
!***************** tolerance END ************
if loc_op=1 then bMainFieldFix=1 else bMainFieldFix=0
! Parapet Height Definition
gs_parh = 0
! --- parameters from subtype template
!*** Stock & Rahmen stb_r = gs_stb_r stb_m = gs_stb_m stb_l = gs_stb_l stb_ob = gs_stb_ob stb_u = gs_stb_u rab_ob = gs_rab_ob rab_u = gs_rab_u
!*** Fensterbank suba_l = gs_suba_l suba_r = gs_suba_r
!*** Simsbrett feba_i = gs_fi dars_2D = gs_dars_2D siv = max(gs_siv, WALL_THICKNESS-WIDO_SILL-gs_frame_thk)
!*** Heizkorpernische tiefe_hkorp = gs_thn if not(gs_hn) then tiefe_hkorp=0
! --- parameters end ---
!*********** Frame Width
if not(gs_stockb) then ! equal profiles stb_ob=gs_frame_width stb_w=gs_frame_width stb_r=gs_frame_width stb_l=gs_frame_width stb_m=gs_frame_width - gs_tolerance vb_ob=gs_vb vb_l=gs_vb vb_r=gs_vb vb_u=gs_vb endif
if not(gs_ver_r) then rab_u=gs_sash_width rab_ob=gs_sash_width endif
!*********** Fensterbank
if gs_feba_a+feba_i>0 then feba=1 if feba_a2+feba_i2>0 then feba2=1
if iSillType = SILL_METAL then suba_r=0 suba_l=0 endif
! ============================================================================== ! Turned plaster skin thickness ! ==============================================================================
wallIsLeft = (SYMB_ROTANGLE > EPS) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE bOutsideAtRefLine = (wallIsLeft exor AC_Wall_Direction_Type <> 1)
if bOutsideAtRefLine then thkSkinAtSillLeft = thkSkinTurnInLeft thkSkinAtSillRight = thkSkinTurnInRight penSkinAtSill = penSkinContourIn ltSkinAtSill = ltSkinContourIn
thkSkinAtBoardLeft = thkSkinTurnOutLeft thkSkinAtBoardRight = thkSkinTurnOutRight penSkinAtBoard = penSkinContourOut ltSkinAtBoard = ltSkinContourOut else thkSkinAtSillLeft = thkSkinTurnOutLeft thkSkinAtSillRight = thkSkinTurnOutRight penSkinAtSill = penSkinContourOut ltSkinAtSill = ltSkinContourOut
thkSkinAtBoardLeft = thkSkinTurnInLeft thkSkinAtBoardRight = thkSkinTurnInRight penSkinAtBoard = penSkinContourIn ltSkinAtBoard = ltSkinContourIn endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
!*********** frame & sash widths
if not(gs_stockb) then lock "gs_stb_ob" lock "stb_w" lock "gs_stb_l" lock "gs_stb_r" lock "gs_stb_m" endif
if not(gs_ver_r) then lock "gs_rab_ob" lock "gs_rab_u" endif
!***************** simmetry
if symm then parameters bf1=a/2 lock "bf1" endif
!******************************** Fensterbank
if iSillType = SILL_METAL then lock "gs_suba_r" lock "gs_suba_l" lock "gs_nd" lock "gs_w" endif
if feba_i+feba_i2=0 then parameters gs_dars_2D=0 dars_2D=0 lock "gs_dars_2D" lock "gs_pen_sims" lock "gs_siv" lock "gs_subi_l" lock "gs_subi_r" lock "gs_sfbi" endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="gs_fi" and feba_i=1 then parameters gs_dars_2D=1 dars_2D=1 endif
if gs_feba_a+feba_a2=0 then lock "iSillType" lock "gs_fbl" lock "gs_suba_l" lock "gs_suba_r" lock "gs_fbh" lock "gs_nh" lock "gs_w" lock "gs_nd" lock "gs_pen_schnitt" lock "gs_fill_schnitt" lock "gs_fbh" lock "gs_p_schnittschraff" endif

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
